kip.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: I’ve only had an hour’s kip.
We ought to get some kip.
kip.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to sleep somewhere, especially somewhere that is not your home
kip.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: There are rooms for drivers to kip down for the night.
Mum says you can kip on the sofa tonight.
